summary: Changes all of the font into Comic Sans MS.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][color=#00ff00]Description[/color]
Do you love Comic Sans? Neither do I, that's exactly why I decided to make this mod. All it does is simply change all the game text into the best worst font ever, Comic Sans.

[color=#00ff00]Compatibility[/color]
It works with everything except other mods that change font.

[color=#00ff00]Installation[/color]
Use Nexus Mod Manager or if you want to do a manual install extract the files into your Data folder.

[color=#00ff00]Issues[/color]
Since the font in Skyrim was not intended to be Comic Sans there is some clipping with the text. Currently I have no idea how to change font size so I can't fix this right now.

[color=#00ff00]Credits[/color]
Valistar for explaining how to change the fontÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/95/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D95%26preview%3D&pUp=1]here[/url].
Gopher for inspiring me from this video:
[youtube]xNtQv6MQs1o[/youtube][/size][/font]
author: BoinkVX
